groot.settings module¶

groot.settings.get_env(setting, env={'API_BASE': 'http://wevolver:8000/api/2', 'AUTH_BASE': 'http://wevolver:8000/o', 'TEST_API_BASE': 'http://dev.wevolver.com/api/2', 'TEST_AUTH_BASE': 'https://dev.wevolver.com/o', 'TOKEN_SECRET': 'open'})[source]¶

Get the env variable or return explicit exception.

groot.urls module¶

groot.wsgi module¶

WSGI config for versioning project.

It exposes the WSGI callable as a module-level variable named application.

For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.8/howto/deployment/wsgi/
